Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."NMC_CMN_LOOKUPS_UPD_SORT_SP" ( P_LOOKUP_ID IN NUMBER, P_SORT_ORDER IN NUMBER, P_LAST_UPDATED_DATE IN DATE, P_LAST_UPDATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1 ) IS BEGIN UPDATE CMN_LOOKUPS SET SORT_ORDER = P_SORT_ORDER WHERE ID = P_LOOKUP_ID; END;
